name: Exp. Service
description:
This is an incomplete game

Synopsis: Facing uncertainties going to adulthood, the daughter of the underworld tries to open a rental service for ghosts (though questionably unethical at times).

This is:
- a WIP project
- Around <2000 words
- Supposed to be a submission for a Halloween Contest n 2021
- Tiêu (the MC) is a name taken inspiration by another artist's OC's Tiêu (their art is here, please check them out!). I

--

I made this a month before going to my first year in college. It was a challenge I want to accomplish before I lost the free time I had before. However, my perfectionist still got the better of me so the story is like 5%. Writing is not my strongest suit, (it's so bad, I can't even bring myself to read it after finishing the demo). I do remember feeling good about the visual hopefully its a balance trade off TT. 

As I was unable to complete the game as I intended, internal turmoil was all I felt finishing the game. However, drafting this on itch.io finally gave me the closure that was needed for a whole month's worth of work.

Replaying the game, I realized how much of myself was in it. The uncertainties to the toxic self-indulgence.  She does sound like a brat and a little two-dimensional lolitbelikedatsometime. def comes from a beginner writing andunresolvedemotionalbaggage. However, I changed over the years and def feel more fond of the progress; I don't think anyone will actually play it, however, you may enjoy knowing the behind the scene thoughts (at least ive always like to read them). I will pick this development up in Q3 of this year. 

See you then :)
